snippet: “Boys Who Tricked Me,” a musical by Ben Bonnema, has the feel of a sleepover, encouraging audience members to wear pajamas and share their dating tales for 90 minutes.
lead_paragraph: “Boys Who Tricked Me,” a musical by Ben Bonnema, has the feel of a sleepover, encouraging audience members to wear pajamas and share their dating tales for 90 minutes.

headline.print_headline: ‘Boys Who Tricked Me,’ at the Musical Theater Factory
